patterns.name: Service Module Host Slow Processing

indicators.Slow workflow execution: Workflows taking taking long time due to compilation at runtime.
indicators.Worlflow queue buildup: Due to slow processing, workflow queue builds up.

patterns.root_cause: Service Module Host background process is slow in processing workflows, leading to queue buildup and application slowness.
patterns.investigation_focus: Check if workflow compilation is holding up threads.

patterns.name: Slow OData Queries

indicators.Slow data retrieval: Data retrieval from OData endpoints taking longer than expected.

patterns.symptoms: Application hangs intermittently, database timeouts, connection pool exhausted errors
patterns.root_cause: Inefficient OData queries causing slow data retrieval and blocking threads.
patterns.investigation_focus: Analyze OData query performance and database interaction patterns.
